7struct TextInput {
8 View* view;
9 FuriTimer* timer;
10};

12typedef struct {
13 const char text;
14 const uint8_t x;
15 const uint8_t y;
16} TextInputKey;
17
18typedef struct {
19 const TextInputKey* rows[3];
20 const uint8_t keyboard_index;
21} Keyboard;
22
23typedef struct {
24 const char* header;
25 char* text_buffer;
26 size_t text_buffer_size;
27 bool clear_default_text;
28
29 TextInputCallback callback;
30 void* callback_context;
31
32 uint8_t selected_row;
33 uint8_t selected_column;
34
35 TextInputValidatorCallback validator_callback;
36 void* validator_callback_context;
37 FuriString* validator_text;
38 bool validator_message_visible;
39
40 size_t minimum_length;
41 char extra_symbols[9];
42 bool cursor_select;
43 size_t cursor_pos;
44 uint8_t selected_keyboard;
45} TextInputModel;

47static const uint8_t keyboard_origin_x = 1;
48static const uint8_t keyboard_origin_y = 29;
49static const uint8_t keyboard_row_count = 3;
50static const uint8_t keyboard_count = 2;
51
52#define ENTER_KEY '\r'
53#define BACKSPACE_KEY '\b'
54#define SWITCH_KEYBOARD_KEY '\t'
55

108 {'#', 22, 8},

136static TextInputKey symbol_keyboard_keys_row_3[] = {
137 {SWITCH_KEYBOARD_KEY, 0, 23},
138 {'.', 15, 32},
139 {',', 29, 32},
140 {';', 41, 32},
141 {'`', 53, 32},
142 {'\'', 65, 32},

148
149static const Keyboard keyboard = {
150 .rows =
151 {
152 keyboard_keys_row_1,
153 keyboard_keys_row_2,
154 keyboard_keys_row_3,
155 },
156 .keyboard_index = 0,
157};
158
159static const Keyboard symbol_keyboard = {
160 .rows =
161 {
162 symbol_keyboard_keys_row_1,
163 symbol_keyboard_keys_row_2,
164 symbol_keyboard_keys_row_3,
165 },
166 .keyboard_index = 1,
167};
168
169static const Keyboard* keyboards[] = {
170 &keyboard,
171 &symbol_keyboard,
172};
173
174static void switch_keyboard(TextInputModel* model) {
175 model->selected_keyboard = (model->selected_keyboard + 1) % keyboard_count;
176}
177
178static uint8_t get_row_size(const Keyboard* keyboard, uint8_t row_index) {
179 uint8_t row_size = 0;
180 if(keyboard == &symbol_keyboard) {
181 switch(row_index + 1) {
182 case 1:
183 row_size = COUNT_OF(symbol_keyboard_keys_row_1);
184 break;
185 case 2:
186 row_size = COUNT_OF(symbol_keyboard_keys_row_2);
187 break;
188 case 3:
189 row_size = COUNT_OF(symbol_keyboard_keys_row_3);
190 break;
191 default:
192 furi_crash();
193 }
194 } else {
195 switch(row_index + 1) {
196 case 1:
197 row_size = COUNT_OF(keyboard_keys_row_1);
198 break;
199 case 2:
200 row_size = COUNT_OF(keyboard_keys_row_2);
201 break;
202 case 3:
203 row_size = COUNT_OF(keyboard_keys_row_3);
204 break;
205 default:
206 furi_crash();
207 }
208 }
209
210 return row_size;
211}
212
213static const TextInputKey* get_row(const Keyboard* keyboard, uint8_t row_index) {
214 const TextInputKey* row = NULL;
215 if(row_index < 3) {
216 row = keyboard->rows[row_index];
217 } else {
218 furi_crash();
219 }
220
221 return row;
222}
223
224static char get_selected_char(TextInputModel* model) {
225 return get_row(
226 keyboards[model->selected_keyboard], model->selected_row)[model->selected_column]
227 .text;
228}
229
230static bool char_is_lowercase(char letter) {
231 return (letter >= 0x61 && letter <= 0x7A);
232}
233
234static char char_to_uppercase(const char letter) {
235 if(letter == '_') {
236 return 0x20;
237 } else if(char_is_lowercase(letter)) {
238 return (letter - 0x20);
239 } else {
240 return letter;
241 }
242}
243
244static void text_input_backspace_cb(TextInputModel* model) {
245 if(model->clear_default_text) {
246 model->text_buffer[0] = 0;
247 model->cursor_pos = 0;
248 } else if(model->cursor_pos > 0) {
249 char* move = model->text_buffer + model->cursor_pos;
250 memmove(move - 1, move, strlen(move) + 1);
251 model->cursor_pos--;
252 }
253}
254
255static void text_input_view_draw_callback(Canvas* canvas, void* _model) {
256 TextInputModel* model = _model;
257 uint8_t text_length = model->text_buffer ? strlen(model->text_buffer) : 0;
258 uint8_t needed_string_width = canvas_width(canvas) - 8;
259 uint8_t start_pos = 4;
260
261 model->cursor_pos = model->cursor_pos > text_length ? text_length : model->cursor_pos;
262 size_t cursor_pos = model->cursor_pos;
263
264 canvas_clear(canvas);
265 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
266
267 canvas_draw_str(canvas, 2, 8, model->header);
268 elements_slightly_rounded_frame(canvas, 1, 12, 126, 15);
269
270 char buf[text_length + 1];
271 if(model->text_buffer) {
272 strlcpy(buf, model->text_buffer, sizeof(buf));
273 }
274 char* str = buf;
275
276 if(model->clear_default_text) {
277 elements_slightly_rounded_box(
278 canvas, start_pos - 1, 14, canvas_string_width(canvas, str) + 2, 10);
279 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
280 } else {
281 char* move = str + cursor_pos;
282 memmove(move + 1, move, strlen(move) + 1);
283 str[cursor_pos] = '|';
284 }
285
286 if(cursor_pos > 0 && canvas_string_width(canvas, str) > needed_string_width) {
287 canvas_draw_str(canvas, start_pos, 22, "...");
288 start_pos += 6;
289 needed_string_width -= 8;
290 for(uint32_t off = 0;
291 strlen(str) && canvas_string_width(canvas, str) > needed_string_width &&
292 off < cursor_pos;
293 off++) {
294 str++;
295 }
296 }
297
298 if(canvas_string_width(canvas, str) > needed_string_width) {
299 needed_string_width -= 4;
300 size_t len = strlen(str);
301 while(len && canvas_string_width(canvas, str) > needed_string_width) {
302 str[len--] = '\0';
303 }
304 strcat(str, "...");
305 }
306
307 canvas_draw_str(canvas, start_pos, 22, str);
308
309 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontKeyboard);
310
311 bool uppercase = model->clear_default_text || text_length == 0;
312 bool symbols = model->selected_keyboard == symbol_keyboard.keyboard_index;
313 for(uint8_t row = 0; row < keyboard_row_count; row++) {
314 const uint8_t column_count = get_row_size(keyboards[model->selected_keyboard], row);
315 const TextInputKey* keys = get_row(keyboards[model->selected_keyboard], row);
316
317 for(size_t column = 0; column < column_count; column++) {
318 bool selected = !model->cursor_select && model->selected_row == row &&
319 model->selected_column == column;
320 const Icon* icon = NULL;
321 if(keys[column].text == ENTER_KEY) {
322 icon = selected ? &I_KeySaveSelected_22x11 : &I_KeySave_22x11;
323 } else if(keys[column].text == SWITCH_KEYBOARD_KEY) {
324 icon = selected ? &I_KeyKeyboardSelected_10x11 : &I_KeyKeyboard_10x11;
325 } else if(keys[column].text == BACKSPACE_KEY) {
326 icon = selected ? &I_KeyBackspaceSelected_17x11 : &I_KeyBackspace_17x11;
327 }
328 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
329 if(icon != NULL) {
330 canvas_draw_icon(
331 canvas,
332 keyboard_origin_x + keys[column].x,
333 keyboard_origin_y + keys[column].y,
334 icon);
335 } else {
336 if(selected) {
337 elements_slightly_rounded_box(
338 canvas,
339 keyboard_origin_x + keys[column].x - 2,
340 keyboard_origin_y + keys[column].y - 9,
341 9,
342 11);
343 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
344 }
345
346 char glyph = keys[column].text;
347 if(uppercase && !symbols) {
348 canvas_draw_glyph(
349 canvas,
350 keyboard_origin_x + keys[column].x,
351 keyboard_origin_y + keys[column].y,
352 char_to_uppercase(glyph));
353 } else {
354 canvas_draw_glyph(
355 canvas,
356 keyboard_origin_x + keys[column].x,
357 keyboard_origin_y + keys[column].y -
358 (glyph == '_' || char_is_lowercase(glyph)),
359 glyph);
360 }
361 }
362 }
363 }
364 if(model->validator_message_visible) {
365 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
366 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
367 canvas_draw_box(canvas, 8, 10, 110, 48);
368 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
369 canvas_draw_icon(canvas, 10, 14, &I_WarningDolphin_45x42);
370 canvas_draw_rframe(canvas, 8, 8, 112, 50, 3);
371 canvas_draw_rframe(canvas, 9, 9, 110, 48, 2);
372 elements_multiline_text(canvas, 62, 20, furi_string_get_cstr(model->validator_text));
373 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontKeyboard);
374 }
375}
376
377static void text_input_handle_up(TextInput* text_input, TextInputModel* model) {
378 UNUSED(text_input);
379 if(model->selected_row > 0) {
380 model->selected_row--;
381 if(model->selected_row == 0 &&
382 model->selected_column >
383 get_row_size(keyboards[model->selected_keyboard], model->selected_row) - 6) {
384 model->selected_column = model->selected_column + 1;
385 }
386 if(model->selected_row == 1 &&
387 model->selected_keyboard == symbol_keyboard.keyboard_index) {
388 if(model->selected_column > 5)
389 model->selected_column += 2;
390 else if(model->selected_column > 1)
391 model->selected_column += 1;
392 }
393 } else {
394 model->cursor_select = true;
395 model->clear_default_text = false;
396 }
397}
398
399static void text_input_handle_down(TextInput* text_input, TextInputModel* model) {
400 UNUSED(text_input);
401 if(model->cursor_select) {
402 model->cursor_select = false;
403 } else if(model->selected_row < keyboard_row_count - 1) {
404 model->selected_row++;
405 if(model->selected_row == 1 &&
406 model->selected_column >
407 get_row_size(keyboards[model->selected_keyboard], model->selected_row) - 4) {
408 model->selected_column = model->selected_column - 1;
409 }
410 if(model->selected_row == 2 &&
411 model->selected_keyboard == symbol_keyboard.keyboard_index) {
412 if(model->selected_column > 6)
413 model->selected_column -= 2;
414 else if(model->selected_column > 1)
415 model->selected_column -= 1;
416 }
417 }
418}
419
420static void text_input_handle_left(TextInput* text_input, TextInputModel* model) {
421 UNUSED(text_input);
422 if(model->cursor_select) {
423 model->clear_default_text = false;
424 if(model->cursor_pos > 0) {
425 model->cursor_pos = CLAMP(model->cursor_pos - 1, strlen(model->text_buffer), 0u);
426 }
427 } else if(model->selected_column > 0) {
428 model->selected_column--;
429 } else {
430 model->selected_column =
431 get_row_size(keyboards[model->selected_keyboard], model->selected_row) - 1;
432 }
433}
434
435static void text_input_handle_right(TextInput* text_input, TextInputModel* model) {
436 UNUSED(text_input);
437 if(model->cursor_select) {
438 model->clear_default_text = false;
439 model->cursor_pos = CLAMP(model->cursor_pos + 1, strlen(model->text_buffer), 0u);
440 } else if(
441 model->selected_column <
442 get_row_size(keyboards[model->selected_keyboard], model->selected_row) - 1) {
443 model->selected_column++;
444 } else {
445 model->selected_column = 0;
446 }
447}
448
449static void text_input_handle_ok(TextInput* text_input, TextInputModel* model, InputType type) {
450 if(model->cursor_select) {
451 model->clear_default_text = !model->clear_default_text;
452 return;
453 }
454 bool shift = type == InputTypeLong;
455 bool repeat = type == InputTypeRepeat;
456 char selected = get_selected_char(model);
457 size_t text_length = strlen(model->text_buffer);
458
459 if(selected == ENTER_KEY) {
460 if(model->validator_callback &&
461 (!model->validator_callback(
462 model->text_buffer, model->validator_text, model->validator_callback_context))) {
463 model->validator_message_visible = true;
464 furi_timer_start(text_input->timer, furi_kernel_get_tick_frequency() * 4);
465 } else if(model->callback != 0 && text_length >= model->minimum_length) {
466 model->callback(model->callback_context);
467 }
468 } else if(selected == SWITCH_KEYBOARD_KEY) {
469 switch_keyboard(model);
470 } else {
471 if(selected == BACKSPACE_KEY) {
472 text_input_backspace_cb(model);
473 } else if(!repeat) {
474 if(model->clear_default_text) {
475 text_length = 0;
476 }
477 if(text_length < (model->text_buffer_size - 1)) {
478 if(shift != (text_length == 0) &&
479 model->selected_keyboard != symbol_keyboard.keyboard_index) {
480 selected = char_to_uppercase(selected);
481 }
482 if(model->clear_default_text) {
483 model->text_buffer[0] = selected;
484 model->text_buffer[1] = '\0';
485 model->cursor_pos = 1;
486 } else {
487 char* move = model->text_buffer + model->cursor_pos;
488 memmove(move + 1, move, strlen(move) + 1);
489 model->text_buffer[model->cursor_pos] = selected;
490 model->cursor_pos++;
491 }
492 }
493 }
494 model->clear_default_text = false;
495 }
496}
497
498bool text_input_view_input_callback(InputEvent* event, void* context) {
499 TextInput* text_input = context;
500 furi_assert(text_input);
501
502 bool consumed = false;
503
504 // Acquire model
505 TextInputModel* model = view_get_model(text_input->view);
506
507 if((!(event->type == InputTypePress) && !(event->type == InputTypeRelease)) &&
508 model->validator_message_visible) {
509 model->validator_message_visible = false;
510 consumed = true;
511 } else if(event->type == InputTypeShort) {
512 consumed = true;
513 switch(event->key) {
514 case InputKeyUp:
515 text_input_handle_up(text_input, model);
516 break;
517 case InputKeyDown:
518 text_input_handle_down(text_input, model);
519 break;
520 case InputKeyLeft:
521 text_input_handle_left(text_input, model);
522 break;
523 case InputKeyRight:
524 text_input_handle_right(text_input, model);
525 break;
526 case InputKeyOk:
527 text_input_handle_ok(text_input, model, event->type);
528 break;
529 default:
530 consumed = false;
531 break;
532 }
533 } else if(event->type == InputTypeLong) {
534 consumed = true;
535 switch(event->key) {
536 case InputKeyUp:
537 text_input_handle_up(text_input, model);
538 break;
539 case InputKeyDown:
540 text_input_handle_down(text_input, model);
541 break;
542 case InputKeyLeft:
543 text_input_handle_left(text_input, model);
544 break;
545 case InputKeyRight:
546 text_input_handle_right(text_input, model);
547 break;
548 case InputKeyOk:
549 text_input_handle_ok(text_input, model, event->type);
550 break;
551 case InputKeyBack:
552 text_input_backspace_cb(model);
553 break;
554 default:
555 consumed = false;
556 break;
557 }
558 } else if(event->type == InputTypeRepeat) {
559 consumed = true;
560 switch(event->key) {
561 case InputKeyUp:
562 text_input_handle_up(text_input, model);
563 break;
564 case InputKeyDown:
565 text_input_handle_down(text_input, model);
566 break;
567 case InputKeyLeft:
568 text_input_handle_left(text_input, model);
569 break;
570 case InputKeyRight:
571 text_input_handle_right(text_input, model);
572 break;
573 case InputKeyOk:
574 text_input_handle_ok(text_input, model, event->type);
575 break;
576 case InputKeyBack:
577 text_input_backspace_cb(model);
578 break;
579 default:
580 consumed = false;
581 break;
582 }
583 }
584
585 // Commit model
586 view_commit_model(text_input->view, consumed);
587
588 return consumed;
589}
590
591void text_input_timer_callback(void* context) {
592 furi_assert(context);
593 TextInput* text_input = context;
594
595 with_view_model(
596 text_input->view,
597 TextInputModel * model,
598 { model->validator_message_visible = false; },
599 true);
600}
601
602static void reset_extra_symbols(TextInputModel* model) {
603 memset(model->extra_symbols, 0, sizeof(model->extra_symbols));
604 size_t symbol = 0;
605 for(size_t row = 0; row < 3; row++) {
606 size_t size = get_row_size(&symbol_keyboard, row) - 3;
607 for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
608 FURI_CONST_ASSIGN_(
609 char, get_row(&symbol_keyboard, row)[size++].text, '1' + (symbol++));
610 }
611 }
612 FURI_CONST_ASSIGN_(
613 char, get_row(&symbol_keyboard, 0)[get_row_size(&symbol_keyboard, 0) - 4].text, '0');
614}
615
616static void apply_extra_symbols(TextInputModel* model) {
617 size_t symbol = 0;
618 for(size_t row = 0; row < 3; row++) {
619 size_t size = get_row_size(&symbol_keyboard, row) - 3;
620 for(size_t i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
621 FURI_CONST_ASSIGN_(
622 char, get_row(&symbol_keyboard, row)[size++].text, model->extra_symbols[symbol++]);
623 }
624 }
625 FURI_CONST_ASSIGN_(
626 char, get_row(&symbol_keyboard, 0)[get_row_size(&symbol_keyboard, 0) - 4].text, '_');
627}
628
629TextInput* text_input_alloc() {
630 TextInput* text_input = malloc(sizeof(TextInput));
631 text_input->view = view_alloc();
632 view_set_context(text_input->view, text_input);
633 view_allocate_model(text_input->view, ViewModelTypeLocking, sizeof(TextInputModel));
634 view_set_draw_callback(text_input->view, text_input_view_draw_callback);
635 view_set_input_callback(text_input->view, text_input_view_input_callback);
636
637 text_input->timer = furi_timer_alloc(text_input_timer_callback, FuriTimerTypeOnce, text_input);
638
639 with_view_model(
640 text_input->view,
641 TextInputModel * model,
642 {
643 model->validator_text = furi_string_alloc();
644 model->minimum_length = 1;
645 reset_extra_symbols(model);
646 model->cursor_pos = 0;
647 model->cursor_select = false;
648 },
649 false);
650
651 text_input_reset(text_input);
652
653 return text_input;
654}
655
656void text_input_free(TextInput* text_input) {
657 furi_assert(text_input);
658 with_view_model(
659 text_input->view,
660 TextInputModel * model,
661 { furi_string_free(model->validator_text); },
662 false);
663
664 // Send stop command
665 furi_timer_stop(text_input->timer);
666 // Release allocated memory
667 furi_timer_free(text_input->timer);
668
669 view_free(text_input->view);
670
671 free(text_input);
672}
673
674void text_input_reset(TextInput* text_input) {
675 furi_assert(text_input);
676 with_view_model(
677 text_input->view,
678 TextInputModel * model,
679 {
680 model->header = "";
681 model->selected_row = 0;
682 model->selected_column = 0;
683 model->selected_keyboard = 0;
684 model->minimum_length = 1;
685 reset_extra_symbols(model);
686 model->clear_default_text = false;
687 model->cursor_pos = 0;
688 model->cursor_select = false;
689 model->text_buffer = NULL;
690 model->text_buffer_size = 0;
691 model->callback = NULL;
692 model->callback_context = NULL;
693 model->validator_callback = NULL;
694 model->validator_callback_context = NULL;
695 furi_string_reset(model->validator_text);
696 model->validator_message_visible = false;
697 },
698 true);
699}
700
701View* text_input_get_view(TextInput* text_input) {
702 furi_assert(text_input);
703 return text_input->view;
704}
705
706void text_input_set_result_callback(
707 TextInput* text_input,
708 TextInputCallback callback,
709 void* callback_context,
710 char* text_buffer,
711 size_t text_buffer_size,
712 bool clear_default_text) {
713 with_view_model(
714 text_input->view,
715 TextInputModel * model,
716 {
717 model->callback = callback;
718 model->callback_context = callback_context;
719 model->text_buffer = text_buffer;
720 model->text_buffer_size = text_buffer_size;
721 model->clear_default_text = clear_default_text;
722 model->cursor_select = false;
723 if(text_buffer && text_buffer[0] != '\0') {
724 model->cursor_pos = strlen(text_buffer);
725 // Set focus on Save
726 model->selected_row = 2;
727 model->selected_column = 9;
728 model->selected_keyboard = 0;
729 } else {
730 model->cursor_pos = 0;
731 }
732 },
733 true);
734}
735
736void text_input_set_minimum_length(TextInput* text_input, size_t minimum_length) {
737 with_view_model(
738 text_input->view,
739 TextInputModel * model,
740 { model->minimum_length = minimum_length; },
741 true);
742}
743
744void text_input_add_extra_symbol(TextInput* text_input, char symbol) {
745 if(!symbol) return;
746 with_view_model(
747 text_input->view,
748 TextInputModel * model,
749 {
750 for(size_t i = 0; i < sizeof(model->extra_symbols); i++) {
751 if(!model->extra_symbols[i]) {
752 model->extra_symbols[i] = symbol;
753 apply_extra_symbols(model);
754 break;
755 }
756 }
757 },
758 true);
759}
760
761void text_input_add_illegal_symbols(TextInput* text_input) {
762 with_view_model(
763 text_input->view,
764 TextInputModel * model,
765 {
766 size_t i = 0;
767 model->extra_symbols[i++] = '<';
768 model->extra_symbols[i++] = '>';
769 model->extra_symbols[i++] = ':';
770 model->extra_symbols[i++] = '"';
771 model->extra_symbols[i++] = '/';
772 model->extra_symbols[i++] = '\\';
773 model->extra_symbols[i++] = '|';
774 model->extra_symbols[i++] = '?';
775 model->extra_symbols[i++] = '*';
776 apply_extra_symbols(model);
777 },
778 true);
779}
780
781void text_input_set_validator(
782 TextInput* text_input,
783 TextInputValidatorCallback callback,
784 void* callback_context) {
785 with_view_model(
786 text_input->view,
787 TextInputModel * model,
788 {
789 model->validator_callback = callback;
790 model->validator_callback_context = callback_context;
791 },
792 true);
793}
794
795TextInputValidatorCallback text_input_get_validator_callback(TextInput* text_input) {
796 TextInputValidatorCallback validator_callback = NULL;
797 with_view_model(
798 text_input->view,
799 TextInputModel * model,
800 { validator_callback = model->validator_callback; },
801 false);
802 return validator_callback;
803}
804
805void* text_input_get_validator_callback_context(TextInput* text_input) {
806 void* validator_callback_context = NULL;
807 with_view_model(
808 text_input->view,
809 TextInputModel * model,
810 { validator_callback_context = model->validator_callback_context; },
811 false);
812 return validator_callback_context;
813}
814
815void text_input_set_header_text(TextInput* text_input, const char* text) {
816 with_view_model(
817 text_input->view, TextInputModel * model, { model->header = text; }, true);
818}
819
820bool text_input_insert_character(TextInput* text_input, char chr) {
821 if(chr == 0x1b) { // Arrow escape code = Select input row
822 with_view_model(
823 text_input->view,
824 TextInputModel * model,
825 {
826 model->cursor_select = true;
827 model->clear_default_text = false;
828 model->selected_row = 0;
829 },
830 true);
831 return false; // Don't consume so CLI gives arrow input
832 }
833 if(chr == 0x01) { // Ctrl A = Select all text
834 with_view_model(
835 text_input->view, TextInputModel * model, { model->clear_default_text = true; }, true);
836 return true;
837 }
838 for(size_t k = 0; k < keyboard_count; k++) {
839 const Keyboard* keyboard = keyboards[k];
840 for(size_t r = 0; r < keyboard_row_count; r++) {
841 const TextInputKey* row = get_row(keyboard, r);
842 uint8_t size = get_row_size(keyboard, r);
843 for(size_t key = 0; key < size; key++) {
844 char lower = row[key].text;
845 char upper = char_to_uppercase(lower);
846 if(chr == lower || chr == upper) {
847 with_view_model(
848 text_input->view,
849 TextInputModel * model,
850 {
851 model->cursor_select = false;
852 model->selected_keyboard = k;
853 model->selected_row = r;
854 model->selected_column = key;
855 bool shift = (chr == upper) != (model->clear_default_text ||
856 strlen(model->text_buffer) == 0);
857 text_input_handle_ok(
858 text_input, model, shift ? InputTypeLong : InputTypeShort);
859 },
860 true);
861 return true;
862 }
863 }
864 }
865 }
866 return false;
867}
